tweet.text: RT @StateDept: On February 27, the Department of State will honor Dr. Ralph J. Bunche as one of its #HeroesofUSDiplomacy. During #BlackHist…
tweet.html: RT @StateDept: On February 27, the Department of State will honor Dr. Ralph J. Bunche as one of its #HeroesofUSDiplomacy. During #BlackHistoryMonth, Dr. Bunche is being recognized for his diplomatic contributions to the Department, the @UN & the international community. go.usa.gov/xdmGv
